automate: I recommend the book Automate the Boring Stuff, it's aimed at people with no previous programming experience and it's free to read online: https://automatetheboringstuff.com/
corey: If you prefer learning from videos, Corey Schafer's beginner series is considered very good: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL-osiE80TeTskrapNbzXhwoFUiLCjGgY7
